00049 void Agent::LookAt (const NxVec3& target)
00050 {
00051         // get the actor's current global orientation
00052         NxMat33 rotation = m_pActor->getGlobalOrientation();
00053         // get the local Y axis
00054         NxVec3 nxUp = rotation.getColumn(1);
00055         // convert it to a NiPoint3
00056         NiPoint3 up(nxUp.x, nxUp.y, nxUp.z);
00057         // convert the target to a NiPoint3
00058         NiPoint3 NiTarget(target.x,target.y,target.z);
00059         // get the actor's current global position
00060         NxVec3 pos = m_pActor->getGlobalPosition();
00061         // convert it to a NiPoint3
00062         NiPoint3 NiPos(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
00063         // get a rotation matrix that looks at a certain target
00064         NiMatrix3 newRotation = NiViewMath::LookAt(NiTarget, NiPos, up);
00065         // transform it to a NxMat33
00066         NxMat33 nxNewRotation;
00067         NiPhysXTypes::NiMatrix3ToNxMat33(newRotation, nxNewRotation);
00068         // get the local Z axis
00069         NxVec3 z = nxNewRotation.getColumn(2);
00070         // remove roll
00071         z.y = 0.0f;
00072         z.normalize();

00074         // set the new orientation
